eitem.name: DINS EDGE
eitem.desc: A finely crafted blade with a jewl embedded on the hilt, glowing as if it was ablaze.

item.name: WOODEN SWORD
item.desc: A standard wooden sword used by many aspiring knights during training.

item.name: BROKEN SHIELD
item.desc: A crude shield with splintered edges.

item.name: BOW
item.desc: An aged bow carved from a rustic, yet surprisingly sturdy wood.

item.name: ARROWS
item.desc: These finely cut arrows will surely pierce anything stupid enough to get in your way.

item.name: BOOMERANG
item.desc: A coveted item revered by many as 'The Hand of the Ancient'.

item.name: NIKES
item.desc: One of the seven gifts left to humanity, these shoes will allow you to move at amazing speeds!

item.name: HEART
item.desc: Your slain foe's still beating heart. YUM!

item.name: FAIRY
item.desc: This little creature will heal your wounds! Freak...

monster.name: Stalfos
monster.desc: Some living skeleton that like to poke you with their sword

monster.name: Skulltula
monster.desc: These guys are giant spiders and fall on you at the most inopportune times

monster.name: Like-Like
monster.desc: Amorphous blobs that surround and digest you
